thread.title: How to Navigate the Tumult on Trade

author: Justin Lahart
title: How to Navigate the Tumult on Trade
text:
After a brief respite, investors are getting nervous about trade again.
President Donald Trump on Tuesday said he was unhappy with how trade talks with China have gone, while lawmakers moved to block White House efforts to ease restrictions on Chinese telecom giant ZTE. On Wednesday there was news that talks to renegotiate the North American Free Trade Agreement have stalled.
There...
